name: **Lousy Castle Island**
description: Lousy Castle Island V955-484 Sheet 85 Tiny islet, midway along S side of Whiddy, home to Tree Mallow, and breeding Cormorant and Herring Gull. A stone wall on the S and N sides intrigue, but it seems unlikely there was ever a castle here, unless the builders really were pretty awful. Land on the E side onto sloping shelves.
